Career Statistics

Career

Games: 17

Maryville Debut: Sept. 2, 2023, at Sewanee

Stats Through End of 2023: 24 tackles, including 17 solo; 1 tackle-for-loss for minus-3 yards; 2 interceptions for 52 yards; 1 pass breakup; 1 forced fumble.

Awards

2023 USA South Academic All-Conference

2023 (Sophomore)

Games: 10

Position: DB

Stats: 14 tackles, including 8 solo ... 1 tackle-for-loss for minus-3 yards ... 1 forced fumble.

Best Games: Among special teams tackle leaders with four ... At least one tackle in nine different games ... Best tackle total was career-high three in 48-10 closing victory against Southern Virginia ... One TFL for minus-3 yards and one forced fumble helped Scots take down Centre 34-23 to snap six-game losing streak against Colonels ... Two tackles each against Sewanee, Centre and Huntingdon.

North Central (2022)

Played one season at North Central under head coach Brad Spencer, appearing in seven games for team that went on to win 2022 NCAA Division III national championship ... Played defensive back and on special teams ... Made 10 tackles, including nine solo ... Pass interceptions for returns of 30 yards against Illinois Wesleyan and 22 yards against Lake Forest ... One pass breakup against Millikin.

Before North Central

Attended Brentwood High School in Brentwood ... Played three seasons under head coach Ron Crawford, and then one season under head coach Clint Finch ... Senior-year captain.

Position: DB

Stats: For career, 347 tackles including two tackles-for-loss ... Six interceptions and 33 pass breakups ... Seven forced fumbles and two fumble recoveries ... As senior, 173 tackles including two tackles-for-loss ... Two interceptions for 80 yards ... Five carries for 20 yards and one touchdown ... Set program records for careeer tackles, season tackles and game tackles (23).

Honors: 2022 Class 6A All-State ... Two-time Class 6A All-Midstate ... Two-time All-Region 7 ... 2002 Region 7 Defensive Player of the Year nominee ... 2022 Academic All-State Team ... 2022 James C. Parker Award.

Get to Know: Also played basketball and competed in track and field ... 2022 basketball team captain ... National Honor Society member ... Young Life Senior Leader.

Personal

Born: Jacob Glen Brock in Brentwood.

Family: Parents are Steve and Cara Brock … One brother, Jaden ... Father played football at Western Kentucky.
